title: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: Currently, the table and column data is loaded immediately when the JDBC Data Set Editor page is opened.
EB: The table and column data should be loaded on demand, meaning it should not be loaded until the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query. 
2. Notice that the tables and columns are immediately loaded without any user action. 
3. Expand the tree or apply a filter and observe if the table and column data is loaded at that point.
